nodes.text: The Todirium milita was a militia organization associated with the location Todirium III. Lindon Javes served with the militia before being recruited to the Galactic Empire's Imperial Starfighter Corps.
The Todirium milita was mentioned in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, where it is listed in Aurebesh on the datapad of Terisa Kerrill.
